title: EX-Brave Wants a Quiet Life - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Betrayal   Corruption   Demon Lord   Dense Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Former Hero   Gods   Heartwarming   Magic   Male Protagonist   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   R-15   Royalty   Saints   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Unique Weapons
author: Koji   こうじ
description:
Despite defeating the Demon King, Noel Veigel, who is a Brave was betrayed by his country and comrades. 

“Screw everything else! I’ll live my life the way I want!”. 

Thus, the second life of the former brave begins.>
